page.title: 07Services
page.content: Police The Police Station is a converted house situated on the A449. They do schemes for children in the holidays to show the good side of the Police Force. They are linked to the main headquarters in Stafford. In Penkridge we have a hard working Police Service. Fire In Penkridge the fire crew are all local men who double as firemen. They have a fire engine in one of the many public garages near the centre of Penkridge. If it is a large blaze Stafford send engines to help. Vets There is a large vetenary Surgery in Penkridge which serves a large farming area.
